scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w apps/main" "npm run dev -w apps/membership" "npm run dev -w apps/lending"
scripts.deploy:lending: npm run build -w apps/lending && firebase deploy --only hosting:lending
scripts.deploy:main: npm run build -w apps/main && firebase deploy --only hosting:main
scripts.deploy:membership: npm run build -w apps/membership && firebase deploy --only hosting:membership
scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build -w apps/main" "npm run build -w apps/membership" "npm run build -w apps/lending"
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && node scripts/merge-builds.js && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:free: npm run build:all && node scripts/merge-builds.js && firebase deploy --only hosting,firestore
